Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 060334 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §201 of the Charter of the City of New York for the grant of a special permit pursuant to §74-82 of the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to allow a permanent platform over a railroad easement. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Concerning the petition of Piu Bello, Inc., to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 70-09 Austin Street, Queens (20075075TCQ).

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 060334 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §201 of the Charter of the City of New York for the grant of a special permit pursuant to §74-82 of the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to allow a permanent platform over a railroad easement. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
